meta.name: description
meta.content: Brookhaven School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Brookhaven, MS.

h1.a: At Home Learning Packet & Lunch Pick Ups

div.div: At Home Learning packets and brown bag lunches will be available for pickup beginning Monday, March 23, 2020. Please click headline for details.

Teachers, need help writing a question that matches the rigor of the standards? Parents, want to see what a sample test question might look like? Click this link to have a look at question stems for ELA and math.

img.alt: Mississippi Exemplar Units and Lesson Plans for Teachers Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Mississippi Exemplar Units and Lesson Plans for Teachers

img.alt: DragonFly Student Athlete Management System Thumbnail Image

div.div:
Athletes, Parents, and Guardians of all Brookhaven High School and Alexander Junior High Athletes,
All student-athletes and their parents or guardians must create an account on DragonFly for the 2019-20 school year to participate in all MHSAA activities. The MHSAA is requiring that all athletic paperwork be completed on DragonFly. Please follow the appropriate directions under either Im a Parent or Im an Athlete.
Don't forget to sign up for Peachjar!

h1.a: ActiveStudent - Students check your grades, attendance, etc

div.div: In an effort to ensure the safety of our students, the Brookhaven School District is now requiring individuals to present a photo ID when checking out students from any BSD campus. Thank you for your support.
